item.radiomod.capacitor.tooltip: Stores electric charges for a while
item.radiomod.transistor.tooltip: Solid-state element amplifying or switching electic signals
item.radiomod.diode.tooltip: Solid-state element that let signal pass only in one direction
item.radiomod.coil.tooltip: Can store energy in magnetic field that it's creating
item.radiomod.resistor.tooltip: Creates additional resistance in circuit and lowers current
item.radiomod.tube.tooltip: Amplifies current and voltage in circuit
item.radiomod.pcb.tooltip: Used to connect elements to each other
item.radiomod.circuit_block.tooltip: Block where you can assemble electric circuits
item.radiomod.voltmeter.tooltip: Device that shows voltage value in the circuit
